tripleplay.ui

Interface Icon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageIcon

    public interface Icon
    An interface for icons.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCallback(Callback<? super Icon> callback)
      Adds a callback to be notified when this icon has loaded.
      float height()
      Returns the height of this icon.
      Layer render()
      Creates a new layer for displaying this icon.
      float width()
      Returns the width of this icon.

    • Method Detail

      • width

        float width()
        Returns the width of this icon.

      • height

        float height()
        Returns the height of this icon.

      • render

        Layer render()
        Creates a new layer for displaying this icon. The caller is takes ownership of the new layer and is responsible for its destruction.

      • addCallback

        void addCallback(Callback<? super Icon> callback)
        Adds a callback to be notified when this icon has loaded. If the icon is already loaded, the callback will be notified immediately; otherwise later on the main thread. The callback is discarded once the icon is loaded. This mimics the behavior of Image.
